scripts.name: Backup Configuration
scripts.description: Snapshot all service configurations to S3
scripts.command: etcdctl snapshot save /tmp/etcd-$(date +%s).snap && aws s3 cp /tmp/etcd-*.snap s3://uc-config-backups/

scripts.name: Clear Application Cache
scripts.description: Flush application-level caches across all nodes

scripts.name: Database Vacuum
scripts.description: Run VACUUM ANALYZE on PostgreSQL primary

scripts.name: Flush DNS Cache
scripts.description: Clear DNS resolver cache on all nodes

scripts.name: Restart Service
scripts.description: Gracefully restart a service with zero-downtime rolling update

scripts.name: Rotate Logs
scripts.description: Force log rotation and compress old logs to S3

scripts.name: SSL Certificate Check
scripts.description: Verify SSL certificates across all endpoints
scripts.command: for domain in $(cat /etc/uc/domains.txt); do echo | openssl s_client -connect $domain:443 2>/dev/null | openssl x509 -noout -enddate; done

scripts.name: Scale Down Service
scripts.command: CURRENT=$(kubectl get deployment/${SERVICE} -n uc-prod -o jsonpath="{.spec.replicas}"); [ $CURRENT -gt 2 ] && kubectl scale deployment/${SERVICE} -n uc-prod --replicas=$(($CURRENT-1))

scripts.name: Scale Up Service
scripts.description: Increase replica count by 2 for a service
scripts.command: kubectl scale deployment/${SERVICE} -n uc-prod --replicas=$(($(kubectl get deployment/${SERVICE} -n uc-prod -o jsonpath="{.spec.replicas}")+2))
